scripts.install: git submodule update --init --recursive && (cd gemini-cli && npm install)
scripts.port: rm -rf gemini-cli/packages/bridge-server && cp -r bridge-server gemini-cli/packages/ && cp LICENSE gemini-cli/packages/bridge-server/ && cp README.md gemini-cli/packages/bridge-server/ && (cd gemini-cli/packages/bridge-server && npm install)
scripts.prepare: npm run install && npm run port
scripts.build: npm run prepare && npm run build --workspace=@intelligentinternet/gemini-cli-mcp-openai-bridge
